website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's striking, high-end Galaxy S6 Edge has the beauty, brains and brawn to take down the iPhone 6 and all the Android competition.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge's wraparound screen transforms an already great phone into Samsung's best-looking handset
cons: That supercool design comes with a big price tag, and the screen doesn't deliver any real killer apps
Like the regular S6, the Edge doesn't support swappable batteries or expandable storage

customer_reviews.title: Good phone except system updates daily
customer_reviews.text: The phone continues to ask me everyday to perform system update. And if I do update, it will ask again. I called the company who sold the phone. They had me try many fixes, which none worked. The phone is a Verizon phone which is my carrier, so I do not understand why phone issue cannot be fixed. Otherwise I like the phone.
customer_reviews.author: e. spraul

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty device. Beware of screen burn and battery issues.
customer_reviews.text: Bought new as a replacement for my last s6 edge that had a sudden motherboard failure rendering the device useless. The screen burned in the image of top line of my keyboard, the notification bar, and the lower toolbar for Instagram after about a year which is pretty annoying. Also when my phone hits 20% there's no telling how much battery I really have left. It will suddenly jump to 3% at any moment when in dips below 15-20. And if I plug it in below 5% it will almost always cause the phone to shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Ruppert

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this phone. The design is fantastic, the screen is wonderful and the build quality feels very good. I bought this at the same time as a Nexus 5X as I could not decide which one to go with. After a few days using both phones I had to return the S6. My issues with the phone are that the battery life is absolutely atrocious, the device gets super hot to the touch when using (especially if it's charging while using) and the fingerprint reader just would not work consistently. It locked me out of the phone on one occasion. So back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Read review
customer_reviews.text: The phone we bought from this vendor howls loudly during incoming calls. Yes, howls.....kinda screechy and buzz-y. Hitting it on the palm of your hand does help mute it and sometimes you can actually hear the caller. Other times no. Only about half the texts come through. Seller did not answer my emails. If this is refurbished quality, pass. Next time just buy one for $20 from the guy on your corner. It probably has a ring tone and not a screech.
customer_reviews.author: Revans

customer_reviews.title: Price & function
customer_reviews.text: We've had a land line with CenturyLink for 13 years. Over the last 5 years it's worked about 75% of the time. I don't really like cell phones, but enough is enough. My wife has a similar Samsung Galaxy, so I got this one, called AT&T, They over- nighted the SIM, plugged it in and I'm talking. So far the battery seems to last forever. If you have big fingers a stylus is necessary. I would recommend this phone for anyone that doesn't have to have the biggest and latest.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cox

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This phone has been nothing but a pain since I got it. It randomly turns off, runs through battery SO FAST and also randomly drops 30+ battery percentage points. It was just at 40% five minutes ago and I went to plug it in and it's not charging on any of my FIVE micro usb cords and has dropped to 1%. I "upgraded" from a very reliable galaxy S4 whose only sin was a cracked screen and I regret it every day. Complete waste of $$$.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey bean

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues after only one week
customer_reviews.text: This phone was great for about the first week, then all of a sudden it would just shut off even if the battery was fully charged. When I turned the phone back on, it would say the battery was at >5%. After a few days of battling with it, clearing the cache, turning power saver on, lots of Googling to try and solve the issue, it got to a point where I could not use the phone at all unless the charger was connected. I know that sometimes refurbished phones can be a gamble, but I paid almost $300 for this one and it was useless after not even 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Came with screen burn (EDITED)
customer_reviews.text: It shipped fast but came with screen burn, runs slow, RUNS HOT. Will not buy from this place again, very VERY disappointed! EDIT: Although I was very disappointed with the quality of the phone I received the customer service from the buyer was prompt and genuine and they did a good job trying to fix the problem so I changed my score.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Phillips

customer_reviews.title: When quality matters Samsung delivers!
customer_reviews.text: I took a 6 month hiatus from Samsung to take advantage of an unbelievable deal and it's been the longest 6 months of my life. Lesson learned!!!!!! I will never leave Samsung again. Yes, the brand DOES matter. Samsung and galaxy are the perfect match. Samsung and I will never part. You just don't know what you had until it's gone. If the deal looks to good.........keep walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I was charging the device for like 8 hours and after that and I tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: After 1 week usage the phone turned off by itself and I couldn't turn it on. I was charging the device for like 8 hours and after that and I tried to turn it on and it was working. Than I decided to update the Android, it happened successfully. after I realize the front camera in the dark shows me some blue spot on the screen. Anybody who has the same problem, what can I do ? Next to that I didn't got any warranty paper just a box in that the device and the charger for the phone . Thank you for the help.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone, the battery lasts a long time and I use the phone a lot. It's very sleek and I would certainly buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Horton

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works, but loses battery super quick. Will go from 80% to 4% in minutes. Husband ran over his with a lawn mower and we needed a quick replacement.
customer_reviews.author: WMW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate and learn
customer_reviews.text: So far the phone is great. Still learning things on it. The pictures are clear and not blurry so that's a plus. Delivery was fast and on time. I'm not that phone savvy but so far it's been pretty easy to figure out. A plus is I have two teenagers to help me when needed. I recommend this phone to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used phone that was advertised as in very good condition. The battery drains
customer_reviews.text: Used phone that was advertised as in very good condition. The battery drains, the camera does not work, it continues to update, nonstop. Bought this for my son for getting straight A's in school. So disappointing. Wrote to seller and waiting for response.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great phone. I've been using it for about a ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great phone. I've been using it for about a month now. The speakers are loud ...the reception is good. The Screen is amazing. The battery life is medium. I had a Note 4 before this and it was just too big to fit in shirt pocket. This 5.1 inch phone is the perfect size. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gullett

customer_reviews.title: I wish it works out
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of this phone. Unfortunately, it doesn't hold charge, battery depleted in 2 hours and ran really hot. I returned the unit back.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Phone's great. Sellers not
customer_reviews.text: Phone's great. Sellers not. Contacted them for a replacement yet all the offer is the "refund" which in that case I'll end up paying for the 15% restocking fee and be out of a phone while refund goes through. Worked for 20-30 days fine and the charging port ended up failing. Lucky it still charges wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Mobil

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but junk!
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Won't stay charged. I took it to a store and bought a new battery. Still won't stay charged. Wish I had never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W.

customer_reviews.title: Very good conditions
customer_reviews.text: Very good conditions ... the equipment complied with the specifications ... I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: M J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for mother and her boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: These work great no issues activating them with ATT. Both being used as go phones with zero issues. I was skeptical at first, but these are legit!
customer_reviews.author: lucke3er

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a dollar
customer_reviews.text: Hardly works. GPS never works. Screen is awful. Texting keyboard is awful. Do not bother with this phone!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Dennie

customer_reviews.title: This company sells stolen property!
customer_reviews.text: phone looked great but ATT would not turn on as it was reported stolen in September of 2016!!! Imagine my shock. Edge Cellular

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone since March 11th and have had no problems with it! The phone came in prefect shape, I ordered the Verizon one and have been using it on the Verizon network with no problems!

customer_reviews.title: Came as described, no scratches or dings. However ...
customer_reviews.text: Came as described, no scratches or dings. However had a cheap charger with it. Not a big deal my old charger works with this one
customer_reviews.author: Jack R Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Head phones
customer_reviews.text: Phone looks great. Only thing is the head phone back doesn't work. So I can't listen to music in my car or talk with head phones in.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my phone... I wish it had longer battery life but all around great phone amazing features
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life isn't that great
customer_reviews.text: I live the phone it is an upgrade from my previous phone. The only thing I dislike is the battery life. I have to charge the phone at least 2 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Although this phone arrived quickly and in seemingly excellent condition, verizon was able to set up my phone with no flags or errors on the phone - the phone screen shattered after only 1 day WITH a phone case, when i t was accidentally dropped from 2ft high. I am not sure the screen on all galaxy s6 are that fragile or if it was just a fluke - but if you've ever dropped your phone, even just once, even with a case - I do not recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my boyfriend as s Christmas present , so only had it for about a month and all of a sudden the phone kept overheating for no reason at all? My boyfriend wasn't able to use any of his apps on the phone anymore and the phone continued to over heat for no reason at all , I've had to buy him a new one due to how crappy this one was I paid over 300 dollars for, wouldn't want anyone else to waste their money only to have to get a new phone
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Had a Galaxy S4 active and i really needed a new phone. Was afraid to get a "refurbished" phone BUT i was told by Geek techs at my job that a refurbished phone is actually better because it's bench tested & certified to actually WORK ... I am so far NOT disappointed. Customer service by the Vendor was stellar as well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul  Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she loves it. She saw that I got the Note Edge and she loved it so I got her this one. The Note Edge would have been too big for her little hands. I almost bought this phone for myself but I love a bigger phone.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I would rate it higher but I am having issues ...
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it higher but I am having issues with the home and power buttons not working. Not sure if it is a SW/HW issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Asuncion

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and style!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this phone. I wish the battery life lasted longer though. I Uber and I’d have to charge my phone every hour. But other than that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Galaxy 6 Edge. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Works perfect. Good price compared to buying a new one. It's well worth the money. I've been using it for a while with no problems. Has plenty features. It's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L.

customer_reviews.title: No more Samsungs
customer_reviews.text: I did like it until after 7 months the phone died. Samsung won't honor warranty since it was bought from a third party seller. I am done with Samsung phones, previous ones I have purcashed have had negative issues as well.

customer_reviews.title: better camera, IR (remote control) blaster
customer_reviews.text: Current Apple user. Almost purchased a used iphone 6 for a similar price. This phone in comparison has a larger, brighter screen, better camera, IR (remote control) blaster, wireless charging, expandable memory and I got a 64gb model for the price of a 16gb iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Recieved a broken phone

customer_reviews.title: Hate this phone
customer_reviews.text: It over heats when being charged gets so hot I have to put it up so my child doesn't touch it. It will not stay charged. It freezes all the time. it cuts itself on and off. Cuts me off in the middle of phone calls. Its by far the worst phone I have ever had.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone!

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase refurbished phones from this seller. MY battery only lasts 3 hours with minimal use. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have your own charger!

customer_reviews.title: Phone sucked didn't work both times we got it
customer_reviews.text: Phone sucked didn't work both times we got it, first one we got the person calling you couldn't hear the person on the other end, and sent it back for replacement and then the second one we got did the same thing..sent it back and they refunded our money

customer_reviews.title: My only recommendation would be to supply better chargers. Luckily I still had my fast charger ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone is in superb condition without any malfunctions, cracks or scratches. Everything works as of the device was brand new! My only recommendation would be to supply better chargers. Luckily I still had my fast charger from my previous galaxy S6.

customer_reviews.title: Might want to  pass on this  phone.
customer_reviews.text: Battery has short life. Phone and charger get hot when charging. Hard to find case. Outdated.

customer_reviews.title: This phone would never update fully. Constantly in updating ...

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after only 3 months

customer_reviews.title: Product is cosmetically good. Problem is SPRINT cannot complete actiavtion process

customer_reviews.title: This phone is amazing! The camera takes the most clear and crisp ...

customer_reviews.title: Battery life worthless
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is horrible. Even bought a new battery and my husband replaced it but still terrible. Charges to 100% but 2-3 hours later, even with little use it's already half used.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great looks good took a while to go from apple to Galaxy but I love it !

customer_reviews.title: PHONE BROKE IN LESS THAN 40 DAYS
customer_reviews.text: Phone shut off & will not cut on. WHAT A RIP OFF....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great deal to find on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: A great deal to find on Amazon. The phone functions great and was easy to activate at Verizon. The design is slick and feels great in your hands. The edge designs feels great in your hand, however, the integration in to the software and functionality is very limited. The edge screen helps create shortcuts to your favorite apps, top contacts and even allows you to set up shortcuts to execute certain tasks. The battery is not as strong as that of the Samsung Galaxy S6 (non-Edge) but I guess that is the trade off for visual design and feel. The functionality of the light up edge screen based off preset contacts is useful however not a true necessity.
customer_reviews.author: david_nyc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the Samsung Galaxy S6 edge. Great phone with lots of storage
customer_reviews.author: Julia H.

customer_reviews.title: Phone was defective.

customer_reviews.title: awesome phone

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone. Very easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: We have been very disappointed in the phone. The lights on the bottom blinked off and on. I wasn't sure if this was typical for this type of phone or not. But it drove me nuts when just resting and not being used. The battery did not hold its charge for the day. In less than 3 months, the phone stopped working. Because of the time period, it is not returnable. We have purchased used phones through Amazon in the past. All have been successful. I would pay more for an I-phone knowing I can go to an Apple store and receive qualified trained help at anytime. Disappointed Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone. The battery life could be better, but it is responsive, does well and isn't too big. Since I refuse to pay the big money for the latest greatest, this phone hits a price point that I like and provides both value and quality.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, with the S6 edge cell phone
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, with the S6 edge cell phone. But no happy with the screen for "protection" completely crack/ broke after only one week.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good smartphone...but samsung's android system is not very good,sometimes it just have some lag.
customer_reviews.author: Requiem

customer_reviews.title: the phone is in great cosmetic condition and works perfectly just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Samsung Galaxy s6 edge in 'Very Good' condition and aside from one tiny scuff/nick on the bottom bezel, the phone is in great cosmetic condition and works perfectly just as expected. The price was reasonable too. Thanks! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Glue on the Screen wont go away
customer_reviews.text: There is some sort of a glue on the top right part of the Display and it doesn't seem to go away. I've cleaned it with water and a soft cloth as well. Any way of getting rid of this patches on the screen ?
customer_reviews.author: Akhil C

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have been more pleased. This phone came as advertised. I would recommend this to anyone that is looking for a great phone at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge, White Pearl 64GB (Verizon Wireless)
